data.title: Playlists Archives
data.text:
The Real Wedding DJ Playlist for Kelly & Martin at St Osyth Priory

/

This weekend I had the pleasure to be asked to be the Wedding DJ & for Kelly & Martin’s wedding at St Osyth Priory. What an amazing fun party with a full dancefloor all night.

They had rehearsed their first dance to John Denver’s Annies Song have a look here

John Denver – Annie’s Song

Heartland – I Loved Her First

Natalie Cole – This Will Be

Stevie Wonder – Signed Sealed Delivered (I’m Yours)

Cheryl Lynn – Got To Be Real

Barry White – You’re The First The Last My Everything

Edwin Starr – Contact

Earth Wind & Fire Ft The Emotions – Boogie Wonderland

Jackie Wilson – I Get The Sweetest Feeling

Mark Ronson Ft Amy Winehouse – Valerie

Diana Ross & The Supremes – You Can’t Hurry Love

Pharrell Williams – Happy

Jackson 5 – I Want You Back

Billy Ocean – Red Light Spells Danger

Mark Ronson Ft Bruno Mars – Uptown Funk

David Bowie – Let’s Dance

Mary Jane Girls – All Night Long

Gap Band – Outstanding

Drizabone Ft Dee Heron – Real Love

Whitney Houston – I Wanna Dance With Somebody (Who Loves Me)

Sister Sledge – We Are Family

The Whispers – And The Beat Goes On

McFadden & Whitehead – Ain’t No Stoppin’ Us Now

Earth Wind & Fire – September

Luther Vandross – Never Too Much

Candi Staton – Young Hearts Run Free

Robin S – Show Me Love

Bobby Brown – Two Can Play That Game

Alison Limerick – Where Love Lives (Come On In)

Westend Ft Sybil – Love I Lost

Bon Jovi – Livin’ On A Prayer

Bryan Adams – Summer Of 69

Queen – Don’t Stop Me Now

Kings Of Leon – Sex On Fire

The Killers – Mr Brightside

Fratellis – Chelsea Dagger

Beyonce Ft Jay-Z – Crazy In Love

Christina Aguilera Ft Redman – Dirrty

Usher Ft Lil’ Jon & Ludacris – Yeah!

Wayne Wonder – No Letting Go

Kevin Lyttle & Alison Hinds – Turn Me On

Bob Marley & The Wailers – Three Little Birds

John Holt – Help Me Make It Through The Night

Jocelyn Brown – Somebody Else’s Guy

Sister Sledge – Thinking Of You

Rufus & Chaka Khan – Ain’t Nobody

Fatback Band – I Found Lovin

Sugarhill Gang – Rapper’s Delight

Cameo – Candy

Earth Wind & Fire – Let’s Groove

Lionel Richie – All Night Long (All Night)

Marvin Gaye & Tammi Terrell – Ain’t No Mountain High Enough

Aretha Franklin – Respect

The Beatles – Twist & Shout

Roy Orbison – Pretty Woman

Chuck Berry – You Never Can Tell

Ike & Tina Turner – Proud Mary

Aretha Franklin Ft The Blues Bros – Think

James Brown – Get Up (I Feel Like Being A) Sex Machine

The B52’s – Love Shack

Whigfield – Saturday Night

Don McLean – American Pie

ABBA – Thank You For The Music

If you would like to dance to songs like these at your wedding then please complete the short contact form, email, or call/text to see if I am available to be your wedding DJ.

https://www.ian-stewart.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Kelly-Martin.jpg 966 672 Ian https://ian-stewart.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/Ian-Stewart-Wedding-DJ-Logo.png Ian2024-08-06 11:07:562024-08-06 11:07:56The Real Wedding DJ Playlist for Kelly & Martin at St Osyth Priory

The Real Wedding DJ Playlist for Maria & Jamie in Rayleigh Essex

/

A few weeks ago I had the pleasure to be asked to be the Wedding DJ & Wedding Master Of Ceremonies for an old friend Maria and her new husband Jamie. The ceremony and wedding reception was held in a marquee in Rayleigh Essex.

What an amazing fun filled wedding day and party it was, with plenty of laughs and a full dancefloor to the following songs;

KSI – Holiday (First Dance)

Luther Vandross – Never Too Much

Drizabone Ft Dee Heron – Real Love

Barry White – You’re The First The Last My Everything

The Trammps – Disco Inferno

Edwin Starr – Contact

Ce Ce Peniston – Finally

Bobby Brown – Two Can Play That Game (K Klassic Radio Mix)

Rihanna – Pon De Replay

Ja Rule Ft Case – Livin it Up

Stevie Wonder – Superstition

Diana Ross & The Supremes – You Can’t Hurry Love

D-Train – You’re the One for Me (Shep Pettibone 12″ Remix)

The Whispers – And The Beat Goes On (Ian Ossia Edit)

Michael Jackson – Don’t Stop Til You Get Enough [Dr Packer’s Multi Track Mix]

Cameo – Candy

Dimitri From Brooklyn – Right My Fire (Dimitri From Brooklyn Edit)

Emotions – Best Of My Love

Future Underground Nation – It’s The Way ’99

DJ Luck & MC Neat Ft JJ – Masterblaster 2000

Mis-Teeq – Scandalous (Remix)

Gorillaz – Clint Eastwood (Ed Case Sweetie Irie Refix)

N’n’G Ft Kallaghan & MC Neat – Right Before My Eyes

Wideboys Ft Dennis G – Sambuca

The Real Wedding DJ Playlist for Rachel & Wills at Stanlake Park in Reading, Berkshire

/

On Saturday 13th July I was booked to be Rachel & Wills wedding DJ by Mighty Fine Events at the amazing Stanlake Park, this is the third time I have DJ’s at this beautiful wedding venue.

This was quite a last minute booking as Rachel & Will had booked a band who unfortunately could not appear, se we stood in to their wedding DJ.

What an amazing evening, with the dancefloor full from the couples wedding first dance to the very last song.

Here is the music they and their wedding guests danced too;

Erma Franklin – (I Get The) Sweetest Feeling

Fontella Bass – Our Day Will Come

Grover Washington Jr Ft Bill Withers – Just The Two Of Us

Jimmy Messina – Love Is Here

Captain & Tennille – Love Will Keep Us Together

Paul Weller Thinking Of You

Maze Ft Frankie Beverly – Look In Your Eyes

Bobby Caldwell – What You Won’t Do For Love

The Wedding 1st dance was;

Forest Blakk – Fall Into Me

Here are the songs that the wedding party danced to all night

Toploader – Dancing In The Moonlight

Billy Ocean – Red Light Spells Danger

Van Morrison – Brown Eyed Girl

Beyonce Ft Jay-Z – Crazy In Love

Justin Timberlake – Can’t Stop This Feeling!

Estelle Ft Kanye West – American Boy

David Guetta And Bebe Rexha – I’m Good (Blue)

Flo Rida Ft T-Pain – Low

Beyond Chicago x Majestic x Alex Mills – Million Dollar Bill

Earth Wind & Fire – September

Daft Punk Ft Pharrell Williams – Get Lucky (Radio Edit)

David Guetta Ft Sia – Titanium

Gala – Freed From Desire

Steve Angello & Laidback Luke Ft Robin S – Show Me Love

Avicii – Levels

Cher – Believe

Sweet Female Attitude – Flowers (Sunship Mix)

Artful Dodger & Robbie Craig Ft Craig David – Re-Rewind (The Crowd Say Bo Selecta)

B15 Project Ft Crissy D & Lady G – Girls Like Us

Wheatus – Teenage Dirtbag

If you would like to dance to songs like these at your wedding then please complete the short contact form, email, or call/text to see if I am available to be your wedding DJ.

Wedding DJ for Sophie and Graham at Wycombe Abbey School

/

On Saturday 6th July I was booked to be the Wedding DJ for Sophie & Graham by Mighty Fine Events at Wycombe Abbey School

What a fun day, I was asked to set up early, which isn’t a problem, then wait until the time to start the party. The couple had set up a TV Screen for the guests to watch the England Euro 2024 quarter final, which I, and many of the guests took advantage of.

The first dance was a classic, the timeless The Way You Look Tonight by Frank Sinatra, followed by the following party classics

Frankie Valli – Can’t Take My Eyes Off You

Marvin Gaye & Tammi Terrell – Ain’t No Mountain High Enough

Candi Staton – Young Hearts Run Free

Barry White – You’re The First The Last My Everything

Earth Wind & Fire Ft The Emotions – Boogie Wonderland

Sophie Ellis-Bextor – Murder On The Dancefloor

Rufus & Chaka Khan – Ain’t Nobody (Ken@Work Original Mix)

ABBA – Gimme Gimme Gimme (Sgt Slick’s Melbourne Recut – Edit)

Whitney Houston – How Will I Know

Beyonce Ft Jay-Z – Crazy In Love

Christina Aguilera, Lil Kim, Mya & Pink – Lady Marmalade

Usher Ft Lil’ Jon & Ludacris – Yeah!

Rihanna – Pon De Replay

Kevin Lyttle & Alison Hinds – Turn Me On

Sean Paul – Gimme The Light

Taylor Swift – Shake It Off

Backstreet Boys – Everybody (Backstreet’s Back)

Hanson – MMM Bop

Bwitched – C’est La Vie

Spice Girls – DMC Mega Mix (Edit)

Robin S – Show Me Love (Stonebridge Club Mix)

Kylie Minogue – Spinning Around

Bon Jovi – Livin’ On A Prayer

Wheatus – Teenage Dirtbag

Fountains Of Wayne – Stacy’s Mom

Toploader – Dancing In The Moonlight

Fleetwood Mac Everywhere

Pulp – Common People

The Killers – Mr Brightside

The Jam – Town Called Malice

Kenny Rogers & Dolly Parton – Islands In The Stream

Ike & Tina Turner – Proud Mary

Boney M – Rasputin

Whitney Houston – I Wanna Dance With Somebody (Who Loves Me)

Erasure – A Little Respect

Neil Diamond – Sweet Caroline

Green Day – Good Riddance (Time Of Your Life)

If you would like to dance to songs like these at your wedding then please complete the short contact form, email, or call/text to see if I am available to be your wedding DJ.

Penny & Neville’s Real Kent Wedding at The Holiday Inn Bexley in Kent

/

On Saturday I was asked to be the wedding DJ in Kent for Penny & Neville at a wedding venue that I had not DJ’d at many years The Holiday Inn Bexley

Neville is an established Soul DJ & promoter so it was an honour to be asked to be their wedding DJ

Kent Wedding DJ Playlist

Norman Hutchins – I Really Love You

Dionne Warwick With Elton John, Gladys Knight & Stevie Wonder – That’s What Friends Are For

Imagine you and your guests dancing the night away to these great songs at your wedding.

If you are looking for a wedding DJ in Essex would like these and more songs please call or text Wedding DJ Ian Stewart on 07736-880 790, email at [email protected] or complete the contact form here

https://www.ian-stewart.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/penny-neville-scaled-e1712667876695.jpg 2107 1527 Ian https://ian-stewart.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/Ian-Stewart-Wedding-DJ-Logo.png Ian2024-04-09 13:21:022024-07-10 09:38:50Penny & Neville's Real Kent Wedding at The Holiday Inn Bexley in Kent

Top 200 Requested Wedding Songs

/

Top 200 Requested Wedding Songs

Every year DJ Event Planner, which is the software I use to manage my wedding DJ bookings and administer my wedding planning compiles a list of the top 200 requested wedding songs.

This is from all the bride & grooms who submit their requested songs in advance of their wedding day.

The Top 200 Requested Wedding Songs

Ellie & Jacks Real Hertfordshire Festival Wedding

/

A couple of Saturdays ago I had the pleasure of being the wedding DJ for Ellie & Jacks festival themed wedding at Almshoe Bury Meadow in Hitchin Hertfordshire

This was a truly magical informal wedding party with mainly vegan wedding suppliers in attendance.

As you can imagine the music theme for the evening was mainly Indie & Brit Pop, with some disco & 80’s bangers for good measure.

Their wedding 1st dance was a new one for me Babybirds If You’ll be mine.

Rachael & Richard’s Real Suffolk Wedding at Great Bradley Village Hall

/

On Sunday 28th May I had a road trip via Cambridgeshire in Suffolk for the wedding celebration of Racael & Richard’s wedding celebration.

I arrived and all the guests we outside enjoying the good weather and some amazing indian streetfood.

I was booked for my Twilight service to play a more alternative wedding playlist, the party was so much fun with the dancefloor full all night long.

For the wedding Breakfast playlist Sam & Tom wanted some classical music covers, and an amazing choice of music to keep the dancefloor full
